https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/67J69rbPAbqn7k6KtPT50uE3g5V.jpg Peace Through Superior Firepower is the name of Cradle of Filth's 2005 music DVD released through Roadrunner Records. The title references the popular T-shirt slogan featured in the 1986 film Aliens. The DVD contains a full concert filmed on 2 April 2005 at Elys√©e Montmartre, Paris. It also contains six music videos and extra features including footage of a signing session and a "Shockumentary". Cradle Of Filth: Peace Through Superior Firepower
